short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Syncs your favorite streaming platforms across devices

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
couchsync™ enables users to simultaneously stream Youtube videos in real time, without any loss of quality. Create a party, invite as many friends as you want, and enjoy perfectly synced videos. Users can message other party members using the unobtrusive chat box, and party owners can navigate to other videos and still keep everyone synced!

COVID-19 has limited interaction across the world, but couchsync™ provides a simple way for you and your friends to stay connected during these difficult times. Who says you can't have movie nights apart?

Enjoy, and stay safe!
